issue.title: [Rust] Set up bi-weekly Rust sync call and update website
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11150](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11150). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Given the momentum on the Rust implementation, I am going to set up a bi-weekly sync call on Google Meet most likely. The call will be at the same time as the current sync call but on alternate weeks.

I will update the web site to list both calls.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11150?focusedCommentId=17262983) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
I created the Google Meet for this: https://meet.google.com/ctp-yujs-aee

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11150?focusedCommentId=17301681) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
We should also list the ASF slack channel: https://s.apache.org/slack-invite

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11150?focusedCommentId=17302004) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9708
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9708>
